title: Royal Blood: The Diamond Blade
description: Young readers will enjoy Julia's first action novella, Royal The Diamond Blade. Set in and around Goldberg Castle in northern England, the story follows sixteen year-old Marie and her friend Charlie as they negotiate the twists and turns of late-medieval castle life, as new servants. By the end of this first exciting adventure, and in spite of several life-threatening situations, they do manage to solve a mystery; but is it the mystery of the Mirror, the Blade, or something larger and more sinister?
author: Julia Fettes
